articles.title: Plane passenger's shock after spotting mile-wide meteor crater in desert - The Mirror
articles.description: The gigantic crater was spotted from the plane as it flew over Arizona - it was formed around 50,000 years ago when a 300ton meteor hurtled towards the earth creating a huge explosion
articles.content:
On first glance, it looks like this giant crater has been left after a colossal hand punched down and gouged out tonnes of earth.
